metadata.name: Cmd.EXE Missing Space Characters Execution Anomaly
metadata.comment: Detects Windows command lines that miss a space before or after the /c flag when running a command using the cmd.exe. This could be a sign of obfuscation of a fat finger problem (typo by the developer).

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe/c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\cmd/c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('"cmd/c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe/k')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\cmd/k')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('"cmd/k')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe/r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\cmd/r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('"cmd/r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/cwhoami')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/cpowershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/cschtasks')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/cbitsadmin')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/ccertutil')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/kwhoami')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/kpowershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/kschtasks')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/kbitsadmin')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/kcertutil')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /k')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /k')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /r'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('appdata\\local\\programs\\microsoft vs code\\resources\\app\\node_modules')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe/c .')) AND lower(process.cmd_line) = lower('cmd.exe /c')))

output.summary: Detects Windows command lines that miss a space before or after the /c flag when running a command using the cmd.exe. This could be a sign of obfuscation of a fat finger problem (typo by the developer).
